channel.title: Vista?
channel.description: :confused: I have vista, and mopar client won't load. It acts like it's gonna, but then it just closes. My java is up to date, and mopar is installed through the installer. What can i do to load it properly? (has this question already been answered?)

item.title: Vista?
item.dc:creator: @noobofiyer noobofiyer
item.description:
@noobofiyer wrote:

Run it as a administrator.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista?
item.dc:creator: @arquillius arquillius
item.description:
@arquillius wrote:

Um, actually, I haven’t looked at this topic since before i knew vista. Now that vista and I don’t argue as much i can tell you how to bypass your problem.

1st make sure your java script Developers kit and Java itself are installed in the properway. If you don’t know how. Ask in the forums.

2nd, make sure DEP (data execution prevention) isn’t blocking Mopar or Java, you can do this by making them white listed.

3rd… and this is only if all else fails, Install XP. You can get this by either buying it from microsoft, or heavens forbid, Join a college and get it for free. There are other ways, but their not as legal. This topic is really old, and I was surprised to see an update in my inbox.

Hope this helps you out kiddo. I gave up on Runescape and Moparscape after my college time, and switched to PWI, Guildwars, and PWO. If you can’t understand these accronyms, look them up. It’s Perfect world, Guild Wars, and Pokemon World Online.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista?
item.dc:creator: @tottot33 tottot33
item.description:
@tottot33 wrote:

Do you need java development kit to run it on the web client, it wont even run on the web client for me. I too am having problems with mopar on vista.

item.title: Vista?
item.dc:creator: @Obuntu Obuntu
item.description:
@Obuntu wrote:

Use the web client - Vista sucks your CPU so itll be kinda slow when you play - I ran Ultimate on a 1.5GHz Sempron and was really laggy.

So… ya.
